product_name: Innova Disc Golf Champion Groove Distance Driver Disc
long_description: The Innova Champion Groove distance driver disc sports an innovative groove on the underside of the rim that makes it lighter than other wide-rim, high-speed drivers. Disc offers fast, long and straight flights; it can be thrown low, high, sidearm or backhand. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymer plastics to offer the best combination of grip and durability. Innova Champion Groove distance driver disc is PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
short_description: The Innova Champion Groove distance driver disc sports an innovative groove on the underside of the rim that makes it lighter than other wide-rim, high-speed drivers.
